theorem Topology.P2_iUnion {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {ι : Sort*} {f : ι → Set X}
    (hP2 : ∀ i, Topology.P2 (X := X) (f i)) :
    Topology.P2 (X := X) (⋃ i, f i) := by
  dsimp [Topology.P2] at hP2 ⊢
  intro x hx_union
  rcases mem_iUnion.1 hx_union with ⟨i, hx_in_fi⟩
  have hx_int : x ∈ interior (closure (interior (f i))) := hP2 i hx_in_fi
  have h_subset :
      interior (closure (interior (f i))) ⊆
        interior (closure (interior (⋃ j, f j))) := by
    -- Step 1: `interior (f i) ⊆ interior (⋃ j, f j)`
    have h_int_subset : interior (f i) ⊆ interior (⋃ j, f j) := by
      have h_fi_subset : (f i) ⊆ ⋃ j, f j := by
        intro y hy
        exact mem_iUnion.2 ⟨i, hy⟩
      exact interior_mono h_fi_subset
    -- Step 2: Take closures
    have h_closure_subset :
        closure (interior (f i)) ⊆ closure (interior (⋃ j, f j)) :=
      closure_mono h_int_subset
    -- Step 3: Take interiors again
    exact interior_mono h_closure_subset
  exact h_subset hx_int

theorem Topology.P1_iUnion {ι X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : ι → Set X}
    (hP : ∀ i, Topology.P1 (X := X) (A i)) :
    Topology.P1 (X := X) (⋃ i, A i) := by
  classical
  dsimp [Topology.P1] at hP ⊢
  intro x hxUnion
  rcases Set.mem_iUnion.1 hxUnion with ⟨i, hxAi⟩
  have hx_cl : x ∈ closure (interior (A i)) := (hP i) hxAi
  have h_subset : interior (A i) ⊆ interior (⋃ j, A j) := by
    -- `interior (A i)` is open and contained in the union
    have h_open : IsOpen (interior (A i)) := isOpen_interior
    have h_sub : interior (A i) ⊆ ⋃ j, A j := by
      intro y hy
      have hyAi : y ∈ A i := interior_subset hy
      exact Set.mem_iUnion.2 ⟨i, hyAi⟩
    exact interior_maximal h_sub h_open
  have h_closure_subset :
      closure (interior (A i)) ⊆ closure (interior (⋃ j, A j)) :=
    closure_mono h_subset
  exact h_closure_subset hx_cl
